name: ShowFunc.vim--nianyang
description:
This plugin can show the function's define where the cursor at when you type "fd".
Well,You can also type "(" after a functionname,then the define will show in the command line.

After all:
This plugin supports types such as cpp,c,java,c# with Exuberant Ctags.

My home page: http://www.vimer.cn ,and willcome.
install_details: Put this file in the vim plugins directory (~/.vim/plugin/) to load it automatically.
